verses.name: Leviticus 15:20
verses.text: And every thing that she lieth upon in her separation shall be unclean: every thing also that she sitteth upon shall be unclean.

verses.name: Leviticus 15:21
verses.text: And whosoever toucheth her bed shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.

verses.name: Leviticus 15:22
verses.text: And whosoever toucheth any thing that she sat upon shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.

verses.name: Leviticus 15:23
verses.text: And if it be on her bed, or on any thing whereon she sitteth, when he toucheth it, he shall be unclean until the even.
